Title: Factory Recon
Description:
ZZ-01-47 should be able to make its way in there without drawing too much attention.

But be careful! These goblins are hungry for raw materials. If they spot our bot, they won't show it mercy.
ObjectivesText: Employ ZZ-01-47 to scout the Golem Factory.
CompletionText: Zee-Zee shouldn't be in much danger, as long as she stays away from the big mechs.
RewardText:
So we're contending with a lack of power, materials, and a dangerous amount of goblins.

If I had pores like an outlander, they'd be excreting moisture right about now. Is that proper terminology? I've seen your skin weep moisture before. Remarkable.

Objectives.Text: Command ZZ-01-47 to Scout the Facility
